bill.summary: 4/3/2001--Introduced. Mahoning Valley Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2001 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make grants under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for FY 2002 for: (1) a project for the extension of waterlines in Milton Township and Craig Beach Village, Ohio; and (2) sewer line projects in rural communities in Trumbull County, Ohio.
